page.title: 19CURRENT TRENDS.
page.content: Girls games are usually quiet,like skipping games.They are sometimes played where one person jumps in and they sing a rhyme then another person jumps in,then the other person jumps out.Games like Chain He are played where one person is it and,they have to touch the other people and say Chain He.When the person who is it has caught more than three people they make two chains both with two people in them,then carry on like that till the game is finished. Clothes. Girls and boys both like to wear jeans,tea-shirts.But when we go out we like to wear smart trousers. Pop Music. Pop music is good to dance to,it is also very loud.We use electrictal guitars and drums.The most liked pop group in our class is WHAM!! and lots of other exciting names like: Madona,Duran Duran,Sister Slegde!!!!!!
